Mount_Prospect.All Saints Cemetery:
All Saints Cemetery is located at 700 North River Road, in Des Plaines, Illinois.
The cemetery was expanded in 1954 to include All Saints West.


== Notable burials ==
Michael R. Blanchfield – (January 4, 1950 – July 3, 1969)
James Bowler – (February 5, 1875 – July 18, 1957)
Charles A. Boyle – (August 13, 1907 – November 4, 1959)
John Cadwell – (July 15, 1961 – July 10, 2004)
Harry Caray – (March 1, 1914 – February 18, 1998)
George "Moose" Connor – (January 21, 1925 – March 31, 2003)
